name: TriCoachSim
description:
Become the manager of a national triathlon team. Negotiate contracts with your sponsors, hire coaches and invest in technology to develop your gears.

Set up training and peaking to bring your triathletes to the highest levels of performance at the right time.

Take part in over 50 triathlon events from Sprint to 140.6-mile distance all over the world. Watch the race and give instructions to your triathletes in real-time.

Win Continental, World and Pro championships to become a triathlon legend.
